original: asti ka(smiṁ)ścin (nagare bhūtapūrvo) vaṇikputra †utsannadhanavahśāvidhavo† dāridryābhibhūtaḥ (śiṣyagṛhadeśe vṛddhadhātrīsameto bālabhāvād ārabhya tayā) vṛddha(dāsyā) dhātryā saṁvardhitaḥ.
analyzed: asti kasmiṃścid nagare bhūtapūrvaḥ vaṇij putraḥ utsanna dhana vahśā vidhavaḥ dāridrya abhibhūtaḥ śiṣya gṛha deśe vṛddha dhātrī sametaḥ bāla bhāvāt ārabhya tayā vṛddha dāsyā dhātryā savardhitaḥ

original: (prathamaprādoṣa eva) sa (so 'pyaṁ) dīrghaṁ (ca) niḥśvasya †'cintayat: kaṣṭam, idaṁ dāridryaṁ kiyatkālavadhi syāt, iti dhyātvā† rātrau suptaḥ.
analyzed: prathama prādoṣe eva sa saḥ api a dīrgham ca niḥśvasya acintayat kaṣṭam idam dāridryam kiyatkālavadhi syāt iti dhyātvā rātrau suptaḥ

original: sa ca (niśāvasāne) svapnaṁ dṛṣṭavān. āgatya bhikṣutrayeṇa (prabodhya) samabhi-[407]
analyzed: sa ca niśā avasāne svapnam dṛṣṭavān āgatya bhikṣu trayeṇa prabodhya

original: hito yathā: bhadra, prabhātasamaye vayam anenai 'va rūpeṇa 'gamiṣyāmaḥ.
analyzed: hitaḥ yathā bhadra prabhāta samaye vayam anenai ava rūpeṇa agamiṣyāmaḥ

original: (yat kāraṇam: tava pūrvapuruṣair avasthāpitas trayo nidhayaḥ.)
analyzed: yat kāraṇam tava pūrvapuruṣaiḥ avasthāpitaḥ trayaḥ nidhayaḥ

original: laguḍena tvadabhyāhataś ca dīnāro bhaviṣyāmaḥ.
analyzed: laguḍena tvad abhyāhataḥ ca dīnāraḥ bhaviṣyāmaḥ

original: na ca tvayā 'tra karuṇā kartavye 'ti.
analyzed: na ca tvayā atra karuṇā kartavye ati

original: evaṁ taṁ svapnam anucintayann eva prabhāt(asamay)e pratibuddho dhātrīm abhihitavān: adya, (amba,) tvayā nityaṁ prayatayā bhavitavyam, gomayasaṁmārjanādi parikarma veśmani kāryam, yathāsaṁbhavaṁ brāhmaṇatrayasya bhojanaṁ dātavyam.
analyzed: evam tam svapnam anucintayan eva prabhāta samaye pratibuddhaḥ dhātrīm abhihitavān adya amba tvayā nityam prayatayā bhavitavyam gomaya samārjana ādi parikarma veśmani kāryam yathāsabhavam brāhmaṇa trayasya bhojanam dātavyam

original: aham api nāpitam anayāmi ('ti).
analyzed: aham api nāpitam anayāmi ati

original: tathā cā 'nuṣṭhite śmaśrunakhaluñcanārthaṁ nāpita āgataḥ.
analyzed: tathā ca anuṣṭhite śmaśru nakha luñcana artham nāpitaḥ āgataḥ

original: kṛtacāre śmaśrukarmaṇi svapadṛṣṭa upāyataḥ.
analyzed: kṛta cāre śmaśrukarmaṇi su apadṛṣṭe upāyataḥ

original: (atha vaṇikputras) taṁ chramaṇakaṁ dṛṣṭvā yathādiṣṭam anuṣṭhitavān.
analyzed: atha vaṇij putraḥ tam chramaṇakam dṛṣṭvā yathā ādiṣṭam anuṣṭhitavān

original: dhanaraśayaś ca te saṁpannāḥ.
analyzed: dhanaraśayaḥ ca te sapannāḥ

original: praveśyamāne ca tasmin dhanaughe sārthavāhaputreṇa dīnāraśatatrayamātraṁ (paritoṣaṇāya) rahasyasaṁrakṣaṇāya (ca) divākirṇaye dattam.
analyzed: praveśyamāne ca tasmin dhana oghe sārthavāha putreṇa dīnāra śata traya mātram paritoṣaṇāya rahasya sa rakṣaṇāya ca divākirṇaye dattam

original: nāpito 'pi taṁ dṛṣṭvā kupārāmarśāt[408]
analyzed: nāpitaḥ api tam dṛṣṭvā

original: svagṛhaṁ gatvā 'cintayat: †aham api kṣapaṇakatrayaṁ (lagu-ḍena) vyāpadya nidhitrayaṁ kariṣyāmi 'iti.†
analyzed: sva gṛham gatvā acintayat aham api kṣapaṇaka trayam laguḍena vyāpadya nidhi trayam kariṣyāmi aiti

original: †tato 'sau laguḍaṁ gṛhītva 'vahitaḥ sthitaḥ. anantaraṁ karmavaśād bhi-kṣutrayaṁ bhikṣārtham āgatam.†
analyzed: tatas asau laguḍam gṛhītvā avahitaḥ sthitaḥ anantaram karma vaśāt bhikṣu trayam bhikṣā artham āgatam

original: †tato laguḍena tāḍayitvā (nāpitena) vyāpaditaḥ (ca). na ca nidhir labdhaḥ.†
analyzed: tatas laguḍena tāḍayitvā nāpitena vyāpaditaḥ ca na ca nidhiḥ labdhaḥ

original: †anan-taraṁ rājapuruṣair ākṛṣya nītvā nāpitaḥ śūle nikṣiptaḥ.†
analyzed: anantaram rāja puruṣaiḥ ākṛṣya nītvā nāpitaḥ śūle nikṣiptaḥ

original: ato 'haṁ bravīmi: kudṛṣṭaṁ kuparijñātam iti.
analyzed: atas aham bravīmi ku dṛṣṭam ku parijñātam iti

original: ity aparīkṣitakāritvaṁ nāma pañcamaṁ tantraṁ samāptam.
analyzed: iti aparīkṣitakāritvam nāma pañcamam tantram samāptam
